Od.

programme.title: Madoff: Najveća Varalica U Povijesti
Bernard Madoff, L'escroc En Col Blanc
programme.desc: Bernarda Madoffa je 12. prosinca 2008., uhapsio FBI zbog onoga što se smatra najvećom prijevarom u povijesti financija. Taj zločinac iz visokih poslovnih krugova pronevjerio je 65 milijardi dolara i provesti će ostatak života u zatvoru. Njegova gigantska prevara protezala se kroz više od 20 godina, a u njega su bile uključene desetine ljudi, većinom bez da su to znali - na primjer njegova supruga i dva sina. Ovaj dokumentarac pokušava dešifrirati Madodov nemilosrdni i manipulativni um. Ekskluzivni intervjui s njemu bliskim osobama, stručnjacima s Harvarda i njujorškog sveučilišta osvijetlili su ovaj zagonetni lik koji je Wall Street okrenuo naglavačke. Od šire slike do nepoznatih krucijalnih detalja, spremite se ući u um najpoznatijeg financijskog prevaranta svih vremena.

programme.title: Chambordda Vincija
Les Secrets Du Château De Chambord
programme.desc: Zgrada izgubljena usred parka od 5000 hektara, što je ekvivalent površine Pariza, Chambord je super-dvorac. 156 metara fasade, preko 400 soba, 77 stubišta. Dvorac koji je u 16. stoljeću naručio François 1. također je najmisteriozniji. Već više od pet stoljeća njegov dizajn budi znatiželju. Svi planovi i arhive u vezi s građevinskim radovima misteriozno su uništeni u požaru ... Ima li Chambord tajnu koju treba sakriti? Pitanje je sve relevantnije jer je u vrijeme začeća dvorca najveći genij renesanse radio za kralja Francuske. Taj genij nije bio nitko drugi do Leonardo da Vinci. Koja je točno bila njegova uloga u Chambordu? Od korištenja revolucionarnih tehnika do izvanrednog središnjeg stubišta, postoji li dokaz umiješanosti talijanskog genija u dizajn dvorca? Ima li Chambord skriveno značenje? Ovim dokumentarcem odvest ćemo vas u središte znanstvenog istraživanja. Pomoću 3D skenera, rendgenskog aparata i arheoloških iskopavanja, najpoznatiji stručnjaci pregledat će dvorac kako bi pokušali osvijetliti tajnu koja je skrivena 500 godina.

programme.title: Sanjaj Budućnost
Dream The Future
programme.desc: Kako će budućnost izgledati? Kako će sadašnja otkrića i istraživanja utjecati na naše svakodnevne živote 2050. godine? Slavni znanstvenici, svjetski poznate osobe i ljudi puni strasti iz cijelog svijeta podijeliti će svoja istraživanja i svoje poglede na budući život u 20 nevjerojatnih epizoda od koji je svaka fokusirana na jednu temu: Medicina, Kuće, Hrana, Moda, Prijevoz,.

programme.title: Naša Osjetila Na Višem Nivou
Human+: The Future Of Our Senses
programme.desc: Jeste li spremni uhvatiti se u koštac sa znanstvenom fantastikom? Otkrijte znanost i tehnologiju povećanja i oporavka osjeta te istražite kako će nove tehnologije revolucionarizirati način na koji vidimo, dodirujemo, čujemo i mirišemo. Zaronite u inspirativne i emotivne priče ljudi čiji su se životi u potpunosti promijenili zauvijek.

programme.title: Velika Putovanja Željeznicom Kroz Ameriku
Great American Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Slijedeći Appletonov "Vodič kroz Sjedinjene Države" objavljen 1879. godine, a koji je objavljen u ključnom trenutku američke povijesti (prekretnici iz "novog svijeta" u najbogatiju naciju ikada), Michael Portillo kreće u istraživanje Amerike. Naći će se usred procvata željeznica, u razdoblju kada se Amerika iznova gradi nakon devastirajućeg građanskog rata (i prvog rata u kojem su željeznice imale jednu od ključnih uloga) te u vrijeme kada se industrijska revolucija nalazi u punom zamahu. To je bilo razdoblje kada je Amerika dobila ime koje danas poznajemo - Sjedinjene Američke Države, a njezin je razvoj intimno povezan i s dolaskom željeznica. Michaelovo putovanje pratit će dva različita itinerara: prvi od New Yorka putem rijeke Hudson pa sve do velikih jezera, a drugi od Philadelphije to Jamestowna (država Virginia) koje je bilo prvo stalno englesko naselje u SAD-u.

programme.title: Čudesna Putovanja Vlakom
Des Trains Pas Comme Les Autres
programme.desc: Upoznavanje ljudi kroz putovanja i otkrivanje novih zemalja iz snova, to je DNA ove uspješne serije koja se neprestano obnavlja, godinu za godinom, zemlju za zemljom. Birajući vlak kao sredstvo prijevoza, odlučili smo uzeti vremena za otkrivanje, za sanjarenje i za upoznavanje zanimljivih osoba. Philippe Gougler, naš putnik i svjedok, čvrsto je uvjeren da bez susreta s ljudima nema putovanja. U svakoj zemlji, u svakom gradu, vlak je savršeno mjesto za dijeljenje života s običnim ali i unikatnim putnicima. Od Shinkansen gradskih vlakova pa do Sri Lanke, Philippe susreće lokalne ljude i upoznaje ih. Između dva puta vlakom zaustaviti će se i otkriti najznačajnije tekovine i povijesna mjesta svake zemlje. Od.

programme.title: Teddy Pendergrass
Teddy Pendergrass: If You Don't Know Me
programme.desc: Neispričana i krajnje nadahnjujuća priča o legendarnom pjevaču Teddyju Pendergrassu, čovjeku koji se najavljivao kao najveći r&b umjetnik svih vremena sve do tragične nesreće koja mu je zauvijek promijenila život. Nezaboravan glas hitova "Don't Leave Me This Way", "If You Don't Know Me By Now", "Love T.K.O" i "Close the Door", Teddy je bio prvi muški afroamerički umjetnik koji je u SAD-u snimio pet uzastopnih platinastih albuma, ali njegovu karijeru je pogodila tragedija 1982. godine, kada ga je prometna nesreća ostavila paraliziranog u dobi od samo 31 godine. Kasnije je postigao trijumfalni povratak pred svjetskom publikom na Live Aid-u. Zahvaljujući intervjuima s njegovom obitelji, prijateljima i kolegama, zajedno s legendama industrije Kennyjem Gambleom i Leonom Huffom, te rijetko viđenim arhivskim snimkama, ovaj pronicljiv i dirljiv dokumentarni film bilježi Teddijev uspon u kompleksnim vremenima za Ameriku u šesdesetim godinama prošlog stoljeća i njegov pobjedonosni povratak nakon nesreće koja mu je promijenila život.

programme.title: Brodovi I Ljudi
Des Bateaux Et Des Hommes
programme.desc: Za ljude koji žive u blizini plovnih putova ili na priobalnim područjima širom svijeta, brodovi su bitan element njihova svakodnevnog života. Ova serija vodi nas na putovanje u otkrivanju brodova svih oblika i veličina, koji služe u različite svrhe. Od improviziranog čamca do većih brodova za kolektivni prijevoz, od plutajućih restorana ili škola do tradicionalnih ribarskih čamaca, svaka epizoda isprepliće dva odredišta i kombinira različite vrste brodova.

programme.title: Vrhunski Dizajn Ponovna Posjeta
Grand Designs Revisited
programme.desc: Serijal "Vrhunski dizajn - Ponovna posjeta" prati dizajnera i pisca Kevina McClouda dok pregledava projekte građene u seriji "Vrhunski dizajn" kako bi doznao što se dogodilo - pozitivno ili drugačije - na strukturnim, financijskim i emocionalnim putovanjima ambicioznih parova koji su hrabro krenuli u avanturu životna - gradnju vlastitih domova.

programme.title: Velika Putovanja Željeznicom Kroz Ameriku
Great American Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Slijedeći Appletonov "Vodič kroz Sjedinjene Države" objavljen 1879. godine, a koji je objavljen u ključnom trenutku američke povijesti (prekretnici iz "novog svijeta" u najbogatiju naciju ikada), Michael Portillo kreće u istraživanje Amerike. Od.

programme.title: Volim/ne Volim Francusku
French Bashing/french Loving
programme.desc: "Volim / Ne volim Francusku" su dva dokumentarca koji otkrivaju pozadinu stereotipa o Francuskoj. Zajedno, oni pričaju priču o kompleksnim odnosima između Francuske i drugih zemalja, priču gdje stereotipi puno govore o Francuzima kao i o ljudima i zemljama koji ih ističu. Uz puno referenci na povijest i pop kulturu te komentare poznatih osoba, ova dva dokumentarca vode nas na uzbudljivo putovanje Francuskom. Bon voyage!

programme.title: Punk
Punk!
programme.desc: Dokumentarna serija "Punk", čiji su izvršni producenti Iggy Pop i John Varvatos, namijenjena je obožavateljima, ali i svima drugima, ovog unikatnog razdoblja u povijesti glazbe. Uz brojne intervjue, izvrsne priče, ekskluzivan ulaz na scenu najvažnijih igrača tog razdoblja kao što su The Clash, Blondie i Iggy Pop, prikazat će se rijetke i do sada neviđene fotografije te video spotovi najvećih punk hitova. Od početaka i prvih fanzina pa do ekletičnih izvedbi, dokumentarni serijal "Punk" slavi ovo prijelomno razdoblje u glazbi i po prvi puta otkriva kakav je utjecaj imala Amerika na ovaj svjetski popularan pokret.

programme.title: Velika Putovanja Željeznicom Kroz Ameriku
Great American Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Slijedeći Appletonov "Vodič kroz Sjedinjene Države" objavljen 1879. godine, a koji je objavljen u ključnom trenutku američke povijesti (prekretnici iz "novog svijeta" u najbogatiju naciju ikada), Michael Portillo kreće u istraživanje Amerike. Zaronite u inspirativne i emotivne priče ljudi čiji su se životi u potpunosti promijenili zauvijek.

programme.title: Pavarotti
programme.desc: Filmski tim koji nam se predstavio hvaljenim dokumentarcem "The Beatles: Eight Days a Week" donosi nam svoj novi dragulj….

programme.title: Najnevjerojatniji Hoteli Svijeta
World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: Ovaj dokumentarni serijal koji putuje u svaki dio svijeta priča nam priču o dvadeset i šest hotela u osamnaest zemalja. Od ledenog hotela u Finskoj preko kraljevskog glamura u Indiji pa sve do radnog kaubojskog ranča u Arizoni, raznolikost lokacija koje ćemo posjetiti u ovom serijalu je nenadmašna. Serijal također uključuje i jedinstveni pogled iza recepcije, poput Oberoi koledža u Indiji kojeg svaki zaposlenik tamošnjeg hotela mora pohađati prije nego u njemu započne raditi. Kamere nikada prije nisu ušle u spomenuto sveučilište. Ovaj serijal donosi odgovor na pitanje što je uistinu potrebno kako bi se radilo u najnevjerojatnijim hotelima na svijetu?

programme.title: Vrhunski Dizajn Ponovna Posjeta
Grand Designs Revisited
programme.desc: Serijal "Vrhunski dizajn - Ponovna posjeta" prati dizajnera i pisca Kevina McClouda dok pregledava projekte građene u seriji "Vrhunski dizajn" kako bi doznao što se dogodilo - pozitivno ili drugačije - na strukturnim, financijskim i emocionalnim putovanjima ambicioznih parova koji su hrabro krenuli u avanturu životna - gradnju vlastitih domova.

Od.

programme.title: Madoff: Najveća Varalica U Povijesti
Bernard Madoff, L'escroc En Col Blanc
programme.desc: Bernarda Madoffa je 12. prosinca 2008., uhapsio FBI zbog onoga što se smatra najvećom prijevarom u povijesti financija. Taj zločinac iz visokih poslovnih krugova pronevjerio je 65 milijardi dolara i provesti će ostatak života u zatvoru. Njegova gigantska prevara protezala se kroz više od 20 godina, a u njega su bile uključene desetine ljudi, većinom bez da su to znali - na primjer njegova supruga i dva sina. Ovaj dokumentarac pokušava dešifrirati Madodov nemilosrdni i manipulativni um. Ekskluzivni intervjui s njemu bliskim osobama, stručnjacima s Harvarda i njujorškog sveučilišta osvijetlili su ovaj zagonetni lik koji je Wall Street okrenuo naglavačke. Od šire slike do nepoznatih krucijalnih detalja, spremite se ući u um najpoznatijeg financijskog prevaranta svih vremena.

programme.title: Chambordda Vincija
Les Secrets Du Château De Chambord
programme.desc: Zgrada izgubljena usred parka od 5000 hektara, što je ekvivalent površine Pariza, Chambord je super-dvorac. 156 metara fasade, preko 400 soba, 77 stubišta. programme.title: Sad Na Tajnom Zadatku
Duhovi
programme.desc: Novinari Mariana i Darren odlaze na neka od naukletijih mjesta u zemlji i istražuju opsjednutost Amerike paranormalnim.

programme.title: U Zatvoru
Neprilagođeni I Otpadnici
programme.desc: Tri neobična zatvorenika otkrivaju teške odluke koje moraju donijeti da bi preživjeli u zatvoru. Ako se ne uklope, to može biti vrlo opasno.

programme.title: Svjedoci: Dan D
Eyewitness: D Day
programme.desc: Jedan slavni dan. Pet heroja. Pet ključnih prekretnica koje su promijenile tijek Drugog svjetskog rata tijekom Dana D. Uz rijetko viđenu arhivu, rekonstrukcije i pisane izvještaje očevidaca, ovo je Dan D kako ga još niste vidjeli.

programme.title: Auto Sos
Anđeli Anglije
programme.desc: U obitelji Hutchings-Clarke svi voze Ford Angliju osim Jamesa čiji model nema čak ni motor. Hoće li ga dečki uspjeti spasiti?

programme.title: Znanost Glupog
Psi
programme.desc: Ova emisija, kombinacija znanosti i najspektakularnijih i najbolnijih filmića koji su ikad snimljeni, danas je posvećena psima. Naučit ćemo na koliko se načina psi mogu osramotiti i ozlijediti kad pokušavaju uhvatiti frizbi ili skejtati.

programme.title: Ulični Genij
Veliki Praskovi
programme.desc: Novi znanstveno-inženjerski "kviz" koji izaziva globalnu publiku da odabere točan ishod nevjerojatnih pokusa.

Anđeli Anglije

programme.title: Uspjeh Ili Smrt
Icy Highway Crisis
programme.desc: Zgrabite upravljač velikog kamiona kad se izmakne kontroli na ubojitom crnom ledu i izbjegnite snažan ugriz aligatora ubojice.

programme.title: Brain Games
Fokus Pokus
programme.desc: Usredotočite se na posljednji test s nizom interaktivnih igara i fascinantnih pokusa.

programme.title: Znanost Glupog
Udaranje Glavom I Akrobati
programme.desc: Budite oprezni kad mašete glavom, pokušavate podići nekoga poput labuda ili skačete u kantu da se ne biste osramotili, pa čak i ozlijedili.

programme.title: Znanost Glupog
High Jumps And Shallow Water
programme.desc: Neki ljudi mogu skočiti u more s divovskih litica i izroniti neozlijeđeni, dok drugi završe u krvi nakon skoka s obale rijeke.

programme.title: Auto Sos
Zagonetka Porschea
programme.desc: Tima i Fuzza čeka utrka s vremenom da bi restaurirali Porsche 911 iz 1980-ih, koji je gotovo potpuno zahrđao.

programme.title: Auto Sos
Anđeli Heralda
programme.desc: Tim i Fuzz odlaze u Cornwall kako bi pokušali spasiti trošni Triumph Herald koji je već pet godina ostavljen u garaži.

programme.title: Auto Sos
Rolls Royce 1929 Doktorski Kupe
programme.desc: Tim i Fuzz odlaze u Lincolnshire gdje ih čeka utjelovljenje nekadašnjeg luksuznog doba: Rolls Royce Doktorski Kupe iz 1929. godine.

programme.title: Vrhunski Strojevi
Rođeni Da Budu Čvrsti Švedski Kamioni
programme.desc: Emisija "Vrhunski strojevi" odlazi iza scene fascinantnog procesa konstrukcije nekih od najuzbudljivijih vozila na svijetu. Od najvećih dizalica do najmodernijih zrakoplova. Od velikih tvornica motora do proizvodne linije najskupljih kampera.

programme.title: Megagrađevine
Najveća Drobilica Na Svijetu
programme.desc: Doživite moćnu megadrobilicu. Najveći stroj za recikliranje metala na svijetu za jedan sat može pretvoriti 450 auta u neprepoznatljivu masu.

programme.title: Izgubljena Blaga Egipta
Prokletstvo Mumije
programme.desc: Arheolozi traže drevne egipatske grobnice kako bi riješili misterije jednog od najintrigantnijih artefakta ikada - mumije.

programme.title: Ww2: Pakao Pod Morem
Ubojiti Razarač
programme.desc: U lipnju 1944. Japanci otkrivaju tajnu operaciju šest savezničkih komandosa. Jedina im je nada podmornica USS Harder čiji ih kapetan Sam Dealey dolazi spasiti unatoč tomu što te vode čuva brodovlje ključne japanske pomorske baze.

programme.title: Istrage Zrakoplovnih Nesreća
Nemogući Uzlet
programme.desc: Teretni zrakoplov pada na tlo u švedskom Arktiku. I dok istražitelji istražuju pad, pojavljuje se zastrašujuća slika kaosa i zbrke.

programme.title: Zatočeni U Inozemstvu
Izdani I Uhvaćeni
programme.desc: Veteranka Kim Hood s prijateljicom odlazi na Tajland. Umjesto naručenih kozmetičarskih proizvoda dobiva heroin. Glumac Erik Aude pristaje na prijevoz kožne robe ne znajući da zapravo šverca opijum.

programme.title: Tvornica Hrane
Halloween Specijal 1
programme.desc: Otkrijte čaroliju pripreme pločice od kikirikija i bagel peciva!

programme.title: Tvornica Hrane
Halloween Specijal 2
programme.desc: Ova zastrašujuća posebna epizoda otkriva kako se pripremaju neke od najukusnijih Halloween poslastica: slatkiši u obliku lubanja, vještičje čokoladice i još mnogo više!

programme.title: Inženjerske Veze
Stadionu Wembley
programme.desc: Richard Hammond istražuje svod na novom stadionu Wembley, ključni element u nastojanju dizajnera da stadion zadrži status ikone.

programme.title: Testiranje Viralnog
Ljuljačka Na Vrhu Zgrade
programme.desc: Genijalnost Tima Shawa na test stavlja revolucionarni hoverboard kojim se može upravljati. Par cilja na maksimalan slobodni pad s tornja od 15 katova te odlazi u kupnju namještaja i bavi se složenostima skijanja na vodi na barskom stolcu.

programme.title: Brain Games
Kako Ti Instinkt Kaže
programme.desc: Ova serija otkriva kako mozak procesira informacije povezane s temama kao što su stres, ovisnost, konkurencija, hrana, povjerenje i jezik. Interaktivne igre i pokusi sa skrivenom kamerom donijet će urnebesne i šokantne rezutate.

programme.title: Tvornica Hrane
Čokoladna Čarolija
programme.desc: Otkrijte čaroliju izrade čokoladnih naranči i češnjaka.

programme.title: Tvornica Hrane
Snijeg I Led
programme.desc: Otkrijte čaroliju izrade sladoleda s okusom keksa, štapića od peperminta i više!

programme.title: Ekstremni Vremenski Uvjeti
Man Versus Weather
programme.desc: Ekstremni vremenski uvjeti uzbudljiva je serija koja otkriva neke od najupečatljivijih kamerom zabilježenih trenutaka u svijetu vremenskih prilika i nepogoda.

programme.title: Zemlja Na Rendgenu
Ubojica S Obale Atlantika
programme.desc: Rendgenski pregled Zemlje otkriva da je otok u Atlantiku La Palma nekoliko puta propao u mega odronima zemlje. Još jedan takav mogao bi izazvati toliko jak tsunami koji bi mogao prijeći Atlantski ocean i desetkovati istočnu obalu SAD-a.

programme.title: Ekstremni Vremenski Uvjeti
Super Fantastično Vrijeme
programme.desc: Ekstremni vremenski uvjeti uzbudljiva je serija koja otkriva neke od najupečatljivijih kamerom zabilježenih trenutaka u svijetu vremenskih prilika i nepogoda.

programme.title: Ekstremni Vremenski Uvjeti
Ekstremno Vrijeme Na Djelu
programme.desc: Ekstremni vremenski uvjeti uzbudljiva je serija koja otkriva neke od najupečatljivijih kamerom zabilježenih trenutaka u svijetu vremenskih prilika i nepogoda.

programme.title: Sad Na Tajnom Zadatku
Duhovi
programme.desc: Novinari Mariana i Darren odlaze na neka od naukletijih mjesta u zemlji i istražuju opsjednutost Amerike paranormalnim.

programme.title: U Zatvoru
Neprilagođeni I Otpadnici
programme.desc: Tri neobična zatvorenika otkrivaju teške odluke koje moraju donijeti da bi preživjeli u zatvoru. Ako se ne uklope, to može biti vrlo opasno.

programme.title: Svjedoci: Dan D
Eyewitness: D Day
programme.desc: Jedan slavni dan. Pet heroja. Pet ključnih prekretnica koje su promijenile tijek Drugog svjetskog rata tijekom Dana D. Uz rijetko viđenu arhivu, rekonstrukcije i pisane izvještaje očevidaca, ovo je Dan D kako ga još niste vidjeli.

programme.title: Auto Sos
Anđeli Anglije
programme.desc: U obitelji Hutchings-Clarke svi voze Ford Angliju osim Jamesa čiji model nema čak ni motor. Hoće li ga dečki uspjeti spasiti?

programme.title: Znanost Glupog
Psi
programme.desc: Ova emisija, kombinacija znanosti i najspektakularnijih i najbolnijih filmića koji su ikad snimljeni, danas je posvećena psima. Naučit ćemo na koliko se načina psi mogu osramotiti i ozlijediti kad pokušavaju uhvatiti frizbi ili skejtati.

programme.title: Ulični Genij
Veliki Praskovi
programme.desc: Novi znanstveno-inženjerski "kviz" koji izaziva globalnu publiku da odabere točan ishod nevjerojatnih pokusa.

programme.title: Ekstremni Vremenski Uvjeti
Ekstremno Vrijeme Na Djelu
programme.desc: Ekstremni vremenski uvjeti uzbudljiva je serija koja otkriva neke od najupečatljivijih kamerom zabilježenih trenutaka u svijetu vremenskih prilika i nepogoda.

programme.title: Članovi Kraljevske Obitelji: Izgubljena Pisma
Obitelj Prije Svega
programme.desc: Windsori su pod privatnim i javnim pritiscima. Prilikom posjeta East Endu Bertieju i njegovoj supruzi vikali su: "Ne želimo kraljevske parazite, želimo jesti!" Bio je to početak Velike depresije.

programme.title: Pretraživanje Nila
Izgubljeni Putovi Piramida
programme.desc: Na području Kaira, Nil je zemlju činio plodnom, ali je i opskrbljivao vodom kanale koji su se, među ostalim, koristili za gradnju piramida.

programme.title: Tajne Nacističke Ratne Mašinerije
Oklopna Borbena Vozila
programme.desc: James Holland otkriva istinu o Hitlerovim zastrašujućim oklopnim divizijama te istražuje kako je opsjednutost predizajniranjem oklopnih vozila dovela do njihova pada.

programme.title: Zemljovidi Ubojstava
Jack Trbosjek Drugi Dio
programme.desc: U ovoj dvodijelnoj emisiji ponovno istražujemo zločine Jacka Trbosjeka. Priča je oblikovana senzacionalističkim tiskom iz 1988., a mi uklanjamo desetljeća dezinformacija da bismo otkrili kako su uistinu živjele ubijene žene.

programme.title: Titanic: Priče Iz Dubine
Krivnja Preživjelih
programme.desc: Doznat ćemo više o Robertu Hichensu i Fredericku Fleetu, koji sebi nikada nije oprostio što nije prije ugledao ledenjak; također ćemo upoznati Elizabeth Navratil, čiji je otac bio jedan od 'Siročadi s Titanica'.

programme.title: Uklete Loze
Prokletstvo Bogataša
programme.desc: J. Paul Getty bio je poznat po svom bogatstvu i škrtosti, ali i po nedostatku empatije i samilosti prema svojoj obitelji. Ženio se četiri puta i imao pet sinova, a umro je star i usamljen.

programme.title: Opaki Izumi
Audio Speakers
programme.desc: Audio zvučnici - kakvu ulogu u proizvodnom procesu igra pauk? Kabeli od optičkih vlakana - visokotehnološka znanost iza prijenosa podataka uz pomoć stakla, svjetla i refleksije.

programme.title: Uklete Loze
Prokletstvo Američkih Milijardera
programme.desc: Prezime Rockefeller sinonim je za bogatstvo, moć i američku politiku. Svaki je naraštaj Rockefellerovih obilježila neka tragedija: moraju li možda platiti za svoja djela motivirana novcem?

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Princeza Margareta
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman otkriva pravi razlog prekida veze između princeze Margarete i Petera Townsenda te doznaje nešto više o njezinoj ljubavi prema glazbi i predanosti kraljevskim dužnostima.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Edvard Viii.
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman istražuje Edvardovo djetinjstvo ispunjeno sukobima s dominantnim ocem, njegovo odricanje od prijestolja i Wallisinu nevjeru, a usto otkriva i kako je Edvard postao modna ikona tog vremena.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Napoleon Bonaparte
programme.desc: Tracy u Parizu istražuje Napoleonove veze - od prvih, nervoznih susreta s prostitutkom, do njegove goleme ljubavi prema Josephine - te otkriva tajne njegova uspona i pada.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Adolf Hitler
programme.desc: Tracy putuje u Njemačku da bi otkrila više o Hitlerovu nesretnom djetinjstvu i umjetničkim aspiracijama. Otkriva kako ga je oblikovao Drugi svjetski rat te kako je njegov privatni život pokrenuo mnoga razaranja.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Al Capone
programme.desc: Tracy kreće u Chicago da bi otkrila kako je Al Capone od klupskog izbacivača postao najzloglasniji gangster u povijesti. Otkriva kako je njegov pažljivo izgrađen javni imidž stvorio legendu.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Petar Veliki
programme.desc: Tracy je u Sankt Peterburgu gdje doznaje kako je Petrovo nekonvencionalno djetinjstvo izgradilo vrlo nekonvencionalnog čovjeka te otkriva kako je prosvijetljeni, ali okrutni Petar povukao Rusiju u moderno doba.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Princeza Margareta
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman otkriva pravi razlog prekida veze između princeze Margarete i Petera Townsenda te doznaje nešto više o njezinoj ljubavi prema glazbi i predanosti kraljevskim dužnostima.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Edvard Viii.
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman istražuje Edvardovo djetinjstvo ispunjeno sukobima s dominantnim ocem, njegovo odricanje od prijestolja i Wallisinu nevjeru, a usto otkriva i kako je Edvard postao modna ikona tog vremena.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Napoleon Bonaparte
programme.desc: Tracy u Parizu istražuje Napoleonove veze - od prvih, nervoznih susreta s prostitutkom, do njegove goleme ljubavi prema Josephine - te otkriva tajne njegova uspona i pada.

programme.title: Drugi Svjetski Rat: Utrka Za Pobjedu
Dan D I Nakon Njega
programme.desc: Nema informačia.

programme.title: Drugi Svjetski Rat Bitke Za Europu
Bitka Za Caen
programme.desc: Lipanj 1944. Britanci i Kanađani još nisu uspjeli osvojiti grad koji su planirali osvojiti na Dan D: grad Caen. Ova epizoda govori o krvavoj borbi za grad.

programme.title: Tajna Priča Vitezova Templara
Tajanstveno Nasljeđe Templara
programme.desc: Postoji vidljivo nasljeđe vitezova templara - dvorci, sela i opatije - i nevidljivo, u vidu dugotrajne tradicije tvrdnji o preživljavanju pojedinih članova reda.

programme.title: Muzejske Tajne
Smrt Michaela Rockefellera
programme.desc: Don Wildman istražuje nestanak pripadnika njujorške elite, olimpijski dres povezan s presudnim trenutkom za građanska prava i plastični nož koji je dio zastrašujuće priče o preživljavanju.

programme.title: Članovi Kraljevske Obitelji: Izgubljena Pisma
Nova Obiteljska Tvrtka
programme.desc: Eduard je abdicirao i preselio se u Francusku, u Parlamentu se vodi rasprava o republikanizmu, a u inozemstvu jača nacistička Njemačka; Bertieju u to vrijeme nije bilo lako postati kraljem.

programme.title: Pretraživanje Nila
U Potrazi Za Faraonima Luksora
programme.desc: U Luksoru, sagrađenom na obali Nila, nalaze se najveći spomenici Novog kraljevstva: kompleks Karnak, hram u Denderi i Palača milijuna godina Ramzesa II.

programme.title: Tajne Nacističke Ratne Mašinerije
Podmornice
programme.desc: James Holland istražuje njemačku podmorničku flotu, od ljudskog torpeda do Tipa XXI, te otkriva kako je Hitlerova nesposobnost da shvati važnost pomorskog rata bila ključna za ishod II. svjetskog rata.

programme.title: Zemljovidi Ubojstava
Opsada Ulice Sidney
programme.desc: Pokretne slike promijenile su način na koji konzumiramo vijesti. Godine 1911. snimat će se oružana borba na ulicama Londona, a opsada ulice Sidney bit će prvi izvanredni prijenos vijesti u povijesti.

programme.title: Titanic: Priče Iz Dubine
Misterij I Opasnost
programme.desc: Otkrivamo priče Howarda Irwina i Berthe Milvihill, zatim priču koja stoji iza školskih knjiga Edgara Samuela Andrewa i zastrašujuće izjave koju je napisao u pismu svom prijatelju.

programme.title: Muzejske Tajne
Smrt Michaela Rockefellera
programme.desc: Don Wildman istražuje nestanak pripadnika njujorške elite, olimpijski dres povezan s presudnim trenutkom za građanska prava i plastični nož koji je dio zastrašujuće priče o preživljavanju.

Obitelj Prije Svega
programme.desc: Windsori su pod privatnim i javnim pritiscima. Prilikom posjeta East Endu Bertieju i njegovoj supruzi vikali su: "Ne želimo kraljevske parazite, želimo jesti!" Bio je to početak Velike depresije.

programme.title: Pretraživanje Nila
Izgubljeni Putovi Piramida
programme.desc: Na području Kaira, Nil je zemlju činio plodnom, ali je i opskrbljivao vodom kanale koji su se, među ostalim, koristili za gradnju piramida.

programme.title: Tajne Nacističke Ratne Mašinerije
Oklopna Borbena Vozila
programme.desc: James Holland otkriva istinu o Hitlerovim zastrašujućim oklopnim divizijama te istražuje kako je opsjednutost predizajniranjem oklopnih vozila dovela do njihova pada.

programme.title: Zemljovidi Ubojstava
Jack Trbosjek Drugi Dio
programme.desc: U ovoj dvodijelnoj emisiji ponovno istražujemo zločine Jacka Trbosjeka. Priča je oblikovana senzacionalističkim tiskom iz 1988., a mi uklanjamo desetljeća dezinformacija da bismo otkrili kako su uistinu živjele ubijene žene.

programme.title: Titanic: Priče Iz Dubine
Krivnja Preživjelih
programme.desc: Doznat ćemo više o Robertu Hichensu i Fredericku Fleetu, koji sebi nikada nije oprostio što nije prije ugledao ledenjak; također ćemo upoznati Elizabeth Navratil, čiji je otac bio jedan od 'Siročadi s Titanica'.

programme.title: Uklete Loze
Prokletstvo Bogataša
programme.desc: J. Paul Getty bio je poznat po svom bogatstvu i škrtosti, ali i po nedostatku empatije i samilosti prema svojoj obitelji. Ženio se četiri puta i imao pet sinova, a umro je star i usamljen.

programme.title: Opaki Izumi
Audio Speakers
programme.desc: Audio zvučnici - kakvu ulogu u proizvodnom procesu igra pauk? Kabeli od optičkih vlakana - visokotehnološka znanost iza prijenosa podataka uz pomoć stakla, svjetla i refleksije.

programme.title: Uklete Loze
Prokletstvo Američkih Milijardera
programme.desc: Prezime Rockefeller sinonim je za bogatstvo, moć i američku politiku. Svaki je naraštaj Rockefellerovih obilježila neka tragedija: moraju li možda platiti za svoja djela motivirana novcem?

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Princeza Margareta
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman otkriva pravi razlog prekida veze između princeze Margarete i Petera Townsenda te doznaje nešto više o njezinoj ljubavi prema glazbi i predanosti kraljevskim dužnostima.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Edvard Viii.
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman istražuje Edvardovo djetinjstvo ispunjeno sukobima s dominantnim ocem, njegovo odricanje od prijestolja i Wallisinu nevjeru, a usto otkriva i kako je Edvard postao modna ikona tog vremena.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Napoleon Bonaparte
programme.desc: Tracy u Parizu istražuje Napoleonove veze - od prvih, nervoznih susreta s prostitutkom, do njegove goleme ljubavi prema Josephine - te otkriva tajne njegova uspona i pada.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Adolf Hitler
programme.desc: Tracy putuje u Njemačku da bi otkrila više o Hitlerovu nesretnom djetinjstvu i umjetničkim aspiracijama. Otkriva kako ga je oblikovao Drugi svjetski rat te kako je njegov privatni život pokrenuo mnoga razaranja.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Al Capone
programme.desc: Tracy kreće u Chicago da bi otkrila kako je Al Capone od klupskog izbacivača postao najzloglasniji gangster u povijesti. Otkriva kako je njegov pažljivo izgrađen javni imidž stvorio legendu.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Petar Veliki
programme.desc: Tracy je u Sankt Peterburgu gdje doznaje kako je Petrovo nekonvencionalno djetinjstvo izgradilo vrlo nekonvencionalnog čovjeka te otkriva kako je prosvijetljeni, ali okrutni Petar povukao Rusiju u moderno doba.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Princeza Margareta
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman otkriva pravi razlog prekida veze između princeze Margarete i Petera Townsenda te doznaje nešto više o njezinoj ljubavi prema glazbi i predanosti kraljevskim dužnostima.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Edvard Viii.
programme.desc: Dr. Tracy Borman istražuje Edvardovo djetinjstvo ispunjeno sukobima s dominantnim ocem, njegovo odricanje od prijestolja i Wallisinu nevjeru, a usto otkriva i kako je Edvard postao modna ikona tog vremena.

programme.title: Privatni Životi
Napoleon Bonaparte
programme.desc: Tracy u Parizu istražuje Napoleonove veze - od prvih, nervoznih susreta s prostitutkom, do njegove goleme ljubavi prema Josephine - te otkriva tajne njegova uspona i pada.

programme.title: Drugi Svjetski Rat: Utrka Za Pobjedu
Dan D I Nakon Njega
programme.desc: Nema informačia.

programme.title: Drugi Svjetski Rat Bitke Za Europu
Bitka Za Caen
programme.desc: Lipanj 1944. Britanci i Kanađani još nisu uspjeli osvojiti grad koji su planirali osvojiti na Dan D: grad Caen. Ova epizoda govori o krvavoj borbi za grad.

programme.title: Tajna Priča Vitezova Templara
Tajanstveno Nasljeđe Templara
programme.desc: Postoji vidljivo nasljeđe vitezova templara - dvorci, sela i opatije - i nevidljivo, u vidu dugotrajne tradicije tvrdnji o preživljavanju pojedinih članova reda.

programme.title: Muzejske Tajne
Smrt Michaela Rockefellera
programme.desc: Don Wildman istražuje nestanak pripadnika njujorške elite, olimpijski dres povezan s presudnim trenutkom za građanska prava i plastični nož koji je dio zastrašujuće priče o preživljavanju.

programme.title: Članovi Kraljevske Obitelji: Izgubljena Pisma
Nova Obiteljska Tvrtka
programme.desc: Eduard je abdicirao i preselio se u Francusku, u Parlamentu se vodi rasprava o republikanizmu, a u inozemstvu jača nacistička Njemačka; Bertieju u to vrijeme nije bilo lako postati kraljem.

programme.title: Pretraživanje Nila
U Potrazi Za Faraonima Luksora
programme.desc: U Luksoru, sagrađenom na obali Nila, nalaze se najveći spomenici Novog kraljevstva: kompleks Karnak, hram u Denderi i Palača milijuna godina Ramzesa II.

programme.title: Tajne Nacističke Ratne Mašinerije
Podmornice
programme.desc: James Holland istražuje njemačku podmorničku flotu, od ljudskog torpeda do Tipa XXI, te otkriva kako je Hitlerova nesposobnost da shvati važnost pomorskog rata bila ključna za ishod II. svjetskog rata.

programme.title: Zemljovidi Ubojstava
Opsada Ulice Sidney
programme.desc: Pokretne slike promijenile su način na koji konzumiramo vijesti. Godine 1911. snimat će se oružana borba na ulicama Londona, a opsada ulice Sidney bit će prvi izvanredni prijenos vijesti u povijesti.

programme.title: Titanic: Priče Iz Dubine
Misterij I Opasnost
programme.desc: Otkrivamo priče Howarda Irwina i Berthe Milvihill, zatim priču koja stoji iza školskih knjiga Edgara Samuela Andrewa i zastrašujuće izjave koju je napisao u pismu svom prijatelju.

programme.title: Muzejske Tajne
Smrt Michaela Rockefellera
programme.desc: Don Wildman istražuje nestanak pripadnika njujorške elite, olimpijski dres povezan s presudnim trenutkom za građanska prava i plastični nož koji je dio zastrašujuće priče o preživljavanju.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Posejdonova Ekipa osvaja glavni zgoditak nakon što je morala detektirati samo kako bi preživjela. Prva sezona Goldtimera pada na još niže grane, a Prašnjavi Vragovi iskopavaju žilu od milijun dolara.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Shane i Russell riskiraju da ostanu bez vode i ugroze svoj posao. Kopačima iz Victorije gotovo je nestalo zemlje za iskopavanje, a Zlatni Cigani razmišljaju o odluci koja bi im promijenila život.

programme.title: Riječna Čudovišta
Užasi Južnog Pacifika
programme.desc: Iako je Fiji poznat po prekrasnim plažama, Jeremy je ondje na tragu zvijeri koja ostavlja uznemirujuće tragove na svojim odraslim žrtvama, a usput otkriva i dva podvodna napadača.

programme.title: Riječna Čudovišta
Demon Iz Dubine
programme.desc: Jeremy kreće u potragu za stvarnim stvorenjem koje se krije iza legende o morskoj zmiji. Počinje od La Manchea i završava na Tajlandu, gdje mu mitovi o morskoj zmiji otkrivaju ključni trag.

programme.title: Riječna Čudovišta
Smrt U Australiji
programme.desc: Australija: skupina aboridžinskih starješina prisiljena je iz zrakoplova skočiti u more.

programme.title: Riječna Čudovišta
Demon Iz Dubine
programme.desc: Sve su češći izvještaji o nečemu što napada jedno od najpoznatijih turističkih odredišta na Istočnoj obali SAD-a: Florida Keys. Jeremy kreće na Floridu da bi otkrio identitet tajanstvenog napadača.

programme.title: Garaža Na Kraju Svijeta
Medicinske Saonice
programme.desc: Skijaški klub mora osposobiti saonice za spašavanje. Collin i Corey popravljaju klupske motorne saonice i grade spasilačke saonice za dvije osobe na kojima su i odvojiva nosila.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
Kuća Ili Propast
programme.desc: Claudiju je strah najgoreg kada kuću za spavanje odluče u kamp dovući kamionom. Kada Josh sjedne za volan, njegovu naglu narav testiraju loše kočnice, neravna cesta i svađa s ocem.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
Igra S Vatrom
programme.desc: Ekipa uz strmo brdo pokušava dopremiti vodu za žičanu pilu koja im je potrebna za rezanje goleme stijene, no gusti dim nastao od šumskih požara uzima svoj danak i onemogućava im posao.

programme.title: Rušenje Australija
Sve Je U Lokaciji
programme.desc: Kako bi se srušila najgora kuća u sjajnoj ulici u pomoć stiže teška mašinerija, a ekipa za rušenje mora navući zaštitna odijela za uklanjanje straćare pune azbesta na morskoj obali.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Jastoge
Aussie Lobster Hunters
programme.desc: Posada Bold Contendera kreće do otočića Pedra Branca, na lokaciju koja je poznata po čudovišno visokim valovima. To i jest razlog zbog kojeg malo lovaca lovi jastoge na tom području.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Bikove
Aussie Bull Catchers
programme.desc: Clarry mora prevesti divlju stoku preko Seven Emu Stationa. Liz i Willie na svom su terenu ulovili velik broj divljih bikova, a Lach je isporučio prvu narudžbu ove sezone.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Posejdonova Ekipa osvaja glavni zgoditak nakon što je morala detektirati samo kako bi preživjela. Prva sezona Goldtimera pada na još niže grane, a Prašnjavi Vragovi iskopavaju žilu od milijun dolara.

programme.title: Krntije I Lova
Bangers And Cash
programme.desc: Tri rijetka i prekrasna Alvisa izazovu velik interes kupaca na dražbi, a automehaničarski šegrt koji je u radionici radio prije 70 godina, odlazi na nostalgično putovanje natrag.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Jastoge
Aussie Lobster Hunters
programme.desc: Život na moru zna biti samotan, pogotovo kada ne lovite jastoge; ponovno su se pojavile tajanstvene pirosome i vrše skipera Squizzyja i Deckieja Tabora iz mora izlaze prazne.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Bikove
Aussie Bull Catchers
programme.desc: Clarryjev 14-godišnji nećak pridružio se ekipi nakon problema u svom rodnom gradu. Kurt kreće u najveći lov sezone, u zabačenu divljinu Cox Rivera.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Posejdonova Ekipa osvaja glavni zgoditak nakon što je morala detektirati samo kako bi preživjela. Prva sezona Goldtimera pada na još niže grane, a Prašnjavi Vragovi iskopavaju žilu od milijun dolara.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Shane i Russell riskiraju da ostanu bez vode i ugroze svoj posao. Kopačima iz Victorije gotovo je nestalo zemlje za iskopavanje, a Zlatni Cigani razmišljaju o odluci koja bi im promijenila život.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
Božić U Kolovozu
programme.desc: Claudia i Robin zbog neočekivane kolovoške snježne oluje zaglave u Two Mileu, Gary i Garon voze kroz snježnu oluju da im donesu zalihe, ali i njih će trebati spasiti.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
I Kamion Bi Proplakao
programme.desc: Robin donosi tešku odluku nakon još jednog skupog kvara njegova rudarskog kamiona 6-Packa, a Claudia zove pomoć kako bi odvezli žad iz logora prije zime.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
Pobuna Na Planini
programme.desc: Zima se bliži, a Claudia tjera svoju iscrpljenu ekipu do samog ruba. Živci popuštaju i Claudia se napokon mora žrtvovati za ekipu.

programme.title: Rušenje Australija
Sve Je U Lokaciji
programme.desc: Kako bi se srušila najgora kuća u sjajnoj ulici u pomoć stiže teška mašinerija, a ekipa za rušenje mora navući zaštitna odijela za uklanjanje straćare pune azbesta na morskoj obali.

programme.title: Električni Klasici
Chesil Speedster
programme.desc: Nema informačia.

programme.title: Krntije I Lova
Bangers And Cash
programme.desc: Dave se sprema nabaviti brzi Ford iz '80-ih i čeka ga neugodno iznenađenje ispod poklopca motora, a 11-godišnji Charlie ide na probnu vožnju s opakim Raleigh Chopperom iz '70-ih.

programme.title: Riječna Čudovišta
Smrt U Australiji
programme.desc: Australija: skupina aboridžinskih starješina prisiljena je iz zrakoplova skočiti u more.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Goldtimeri unajmljuju sedamtonski bager u pokušaju da prekinu svoju sušu zlata. Prašnjavi Vragovi riskiraju da ostanu bez vode, a Marcus nestaje dok detektira na vrhu litice.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Poseidon Crew nastavlja potragu za zlatom u divljini, Gold Gypsies suočavaju se s jednom od najvećih odluka u svojoj karijeri, a ustrajnost Victoria Diggersa konačno bi se mogla isplatiti.

programme.title: Gradnja Giganata
Supermost Otporan Na Potrese
programme.desc: Vrijedan 482 milijuna dolara, ovaj vijadukt dug 1067 m bit će ključna poveznica u prometnom Los Angelesu, a uz autocestu, biciklističke staze i nogostupe, sadržavat će i gradski park na 48.000 m2.

programme.title: Gradnja Giganata
Ledolomac
programme.desc: Inženjeri u brodogradilištu u Norveškoj grade najveću superjahtu na svijetu, 180 metara dug ledolomac namijenjen istraživanju opasnih voda oko Sjevernog i Južnog pola.

programme.title: Rušenje Australija
Nema Šale!
programme.desc: Rušenje stambene zgrade trebalo bi ići kao od šale, no brojne su prepreke koje treba savladati. Kad vas od starog sirotišta podilazi jeza, duhove istjerajte jaružalom!

programme.title: Krntije I Lova
Orange Bug & Mk2 Jag
programme.desc: Jarko narančasti Bond Bug s tri kotača iz 1970-ih izaziva podijeljena mišljenja kupaca, ali i oduševljenje u klubu vlasnika Bonda; umirovljeni inženjer daje na aukciju očev Jaguar MkII iz 60-ih.

programme.desc: Posejdonova Ekipa osvaja glavni zgoditak nakon što je morala detektirati samo kako bi preživjela. Prva sezona Goldtimera pada na još niže grane, a Prašnjavi Vragovi iskopavaju žilu od milijun dolara.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Shane i Russell riskiraju da ostanu bez vode i ugroze svoj posao. Kopačima iz Victorije gotovo je nestalo zemlje za iskopavanje, a Zlatni Cigani razmišljaju o odluci koja bi im promijenila život.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
Božić U Kolovozu
programme.desc: Claudia i Robin zbog neočekivane kolovoške snježne oluje zaglave u Two Mileu, Gary i Garon voze kroz snježnu oluju da im donesu zalihe, ali i njih će trebati spasiti.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
I Kamion Bi Proplakao
programme.desc: Robin donosi tešku odluku nakon još jednog skupog kvara njegova rudarskog kamiona 6-Packa, a Claudia zove pomoć kako bi odvezli žad iz logora prije zime.

programme.title: Potraga Za Žadom
Pobuna Na Planini
programme.desc: Zima se bliži, a Claudia tjera svoju iscrpljenu ekipu do samog ruba. Živci popuštaju i Claudia se napokon mora žrtvovati za ekipu.

programme.title: Rušenje Australija
Sve Je U Lokaciji
programme.desc: Kako bi se srušila najgora kuća u sjajnoj ulici u pomoć stiže teška mašinerija, a ekipa za rušenje mora navući zaštitna odijela za uklanjanje straćare pune azbesta na morskoj obali.

programme.title: Električni Klasici
Chesil Speedster
programme.desc: Nema informačia.

programme.title: Krntije I Lova
Bangers And Cash
programme.desc: Dave se sprema nabaviti brzi Ford iz '80-ih i čeka ga neugodno iznenađenje ispod poklopca motora, a 11-godišnji Charlie ide na probnu vožnju s opakim Raleigh Chopperom iz '70-ih.

programme.title: Riječna Čudovišta
Smrt U Australiji
programme.desc: Australija: skupina aboridžinskih starješina prisiljena je iz zrakoplova skočiti u more.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Goldtimeri unajmljuju sedamtonski bager u pokušaju da prekinu svoju sušu zlata. Prašnjavi Vragovi riskiraju da ostanu bez vode, a Marcus nestaje dok detektira na vrhu litice.

programme.title: Australski Lovci Na Zlato
Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Poseidon Crew nastavlja potragu za zlatom u divljini, Gold Gypsies suočavaju se s jednom od najvećih odluka u svojoj karijeri, a ustrajnost Victoria Diggersa konačno bi se mogla isplatiti.

programme.title: Gradnja Giganata
Supermost Otporan Na Potrese
programme.desc: Vrijedan 482 milijuna dolara, ovaj vijadukt dug 1067 m bit će ključna poveznica u prometnom Los Angelesu, a uz autocestu, biciklističke staze i nogostupe, sadržavat će i gradski park na 48.000 m2.

programme.title: Gradnja Giganata
Ledolomac
programme.desc: Inženjeri u brodogradilištu u Norveškoj grade najveću superjahtu na svijetu, 180 metara dug ledolomac namijenjen istraživanju opasnih voda oko Sjevernog i Južnog pola.

programme.title: Rušenje Australija
Nema Šale!
programme.desc: Rušenje stambene zgrade trebalo bi ići kao od šale, no brojne su prepreke koje treba savladati. Kad vas od starog sirotišta podilazi jeza, duhove istjerajte jaružalom!

programme.title: Krntije I Lova
Orange Bug & Mk2 Jag
programme.desc: Jarko narančasti Bond Bug s tri kotača iz 1970-ih izaziva podijeljena mišljenja kupaca, ali i oduševljenje u klubu vlasnika Bonda; umirovljeni inženjer daje na aukciju očev Jaguar MkII iz 60-ih.

programme.title: Krntije I Lova
Bangers And Cash
programme.desc: Dave se sprema nabaviti brzi Ford iz '80-ih i čeka ga neugodno iznenađenje ispod poklopca motora, a 11-godišnji Charlie ide na probnu vožnju s opakim Raleigh Chopperom iz '70-ih.

programme.title: The Full Body Challenge
Full Body Interval Training
programme.desc: Sami Hossny is a lifecoach and a personal trainer. His main mission is motivating people to find free time for themselves in their busy lifestyle in order to be healthier through sports and good eating habits.

programme.title: Morning Yoga: Yoga With Desi
4th Chakra: Heart Chakra
programme.desc: Desislava Atanasova hosts an enriching yoga series based around the fundamentals of the chakras, the perceived circular wheels of energy within our bodies that affect our emotional and physical wellbeing. If you are new to the chakras do not be alarmed; Desi is here to help guide you through a series of exercises that will empower the mind and the body. Her easy-to-follow teachings have helped to develop her into one of the most accomplished presenters on Wness TV, and her classes give participants the foundations for a fuller and happier life.

programme.title: Morning Fitness: Pilates With Dilyana Kostova
Power Pilates For Beginners
programme.desc: Years of experience and practice have shaped Dilyana Kostova into a skilled Pilates instructor, and now she's shaping you with her fulfilling classes that are designed to build strength, stability, flexibility and muscle tone. Her satisfying sessions will work each area of your body, opening your mind to the powerful benefits of Pilates. What many see as simply lying on a mat could not be further from the truth, as Pilates will stretch every sinew in your body and give you the foundations for a strong and sturdy physique.

programme.title: Morning Yoga: Yoga With Desi

programme.title: Morning Fitness: Pilates With Dilyana Kostova
Power Pilates For Beginners

programme.title: Postpartum Recovery With Vanya
Dynamic Workout For Busy Moms Level 1
programme.desc: Brand new mothers can have a difficult time adjusting to their new lives and routines with their new baby such as lacking energy, having no-one to help around the house or just a general absence of 'me' time. One of the most beneficial ways a mother can overcome these problems is by exercising to get her body and mind in shape. Fortunately, Vanya Visarionova is here to help. Vanya has created a series of unique and restorative exercises which take into account a new mother's circumstances and physical wellbeing. As well as increasing fitness, the routines will also provide confidence and motivation.

programme.title: Nadya Daily 1.1
Nadya Daily
programme.desc: Nema informačia.

programme.title: Beyond The Limitations
The Business Of Being E08
programme.desc: Emil Ivanov has been on top of his career when he decides to travel the world seeking the successful formula. On the way, he finds out the key is inside each one of us and the most important thing is the will for change and stepping out the routine.

programme.title: Total Body Shape: Power Yoga With Krisi
Vinyasa Sun Salutation
programme.desc: "Yoga with Krisi" includes various yoga practices such as "Detox yoga", "Аsanas for the chakras" and "Yin yoga". Find the combination of asanas, breathing techniques and meditation that suits you the most and tackle the hassles of today's hectic life.

programme.title: Restorative Workouts With Vanya
Strong Kness
programme.desc: While working, people go to lunch break, scroll down their newsfeed on social media or drink coffee for example. But how many stretch their legs in the office? And most importantly - helping their bodies recover from hours of sitting in the chair? Meet Vanya Visarionova. Her mission is to help people recover their natural pose. And to get rid of all the pains that somehow people cause themselves. With her 10-year-old experience she knows the function of every muscle, of every joint and how they affect the movement or lack of movement of one's body.

programme.title: Feed To Fit
programme.desc: Meet the most famous culinary duo on Bulgarian television - Lora Naydenova and Stoyan Seimensky. Viewers are more than familiar with their ability to find the pleasure of cooking, plenty ideas and perfectly performing recipes. Well armored with their solid experience, Lora and Stoyan will show their audience that not every question has a simple answer nor is there a recipe for every issue.

programme.title: Yoga With Marlene
Heart Opening Practice
programme.desc: Marlene is a non-dogmatic yoga and meditation teacher, combining many different teachings from all over the world to create a bridge between modern urban reality and ancient wisdom. Marlene Smits teaches yoga in Amsterdam and loves to teach workshops at festivals or yoga studios in the Netherlands and abroad. She is also a writer for publications like OM magazine and is owner and designer of Urban Goddess yoga wear brand.

programme.title: Adri S#ares
programme.desc: The host Adriana Angelova is a mom of two, a blogger, an active instagrammer and influencer and last but not least - an editor in chief at the biggest parenting online platform in Bulgaria - BG-mamma. programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Detective
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of young cat named Gumball Watterson. Gumball has a penchant for getting into trouble but he never seems to learn his lesson. Gumball's best friend is a fish named Darwin, who used to be the family pet until he grew legs and became part of the family. Gumball resents his younger sister, Anais, because she is the smartest member of the family. Gumball's mother is the breadwinner in the family, working long hours at the rainbow factory, and his father stays at home watching TV and playing video games.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Flower
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - there's Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues we've all been through. Gumball's hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird….

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe
The Prince And The Hissy Swan
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of Ivandoe, the young prince of the forest who is on a quest for the magical Golden Feather of the fearsome Eagle King. Ivandoe and his dedicated squire, a small bird named Bert discover new and mysterious areas of the forest and an array of peculiar creatures along the way.

programme.title: Ben 10
Story, Board
programme.desc: While on a seemingly endless summer vacation with his Grandpa Max and Cousin Gwen, Ben Tennyson discovers an alien watch: the Omnitrix. This device gives Ben the ability to transform into any one of ten spectacular and powerful aliens! Ben, Gwen and Max travel the country in their motor home affectionately known as the Rust Bucket seeing the sights, stumbling into adventures and beating down would-be villains while generally having a blast!

programme.title: Bakugan
The Ab Bakugan Battle League! Part 1
programme.desc: When Bakugan begin emerging from the earth's crust in a mysterious worldwide "awakening," Dan and his friends find themselves at the epicentre of a new age. They quickly learn that they must grow into more than just suburban kids looking for quick fame in the post-Bakugan era. They must learn how to work with their Bakugan and deploy them in battle in order to survive the seemingly endless forces out to control, enslave or just plain destroy the mysterious race of alien creatures. Dan and his friends seek to become heroes as they protect their Bakugan, the Earth and ultimately an incredible secret hidden beneath their feet.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
Rock'n'lemming
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!

programme.title: Mr Magoo
The Golden Fizz
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
No Fly Zone
programme.desc: After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen - only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese - including waking up Tom!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Charity Case
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Tom's precious blanket to Badwill, Jerry's determined to get it back. Unfortunately, with all the strange, bizarre, enchanted items that have been donated over the centuries, getting anything back from Badwill is not easily done.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Duck, Duck, Loose
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Tuffy's Big Adventure
programme.desc: When Tuffy and Tyke head out on their own big adventure into the snowy mountains during a family vacation, Tom catches the blame from Spike and Jerry for letting them go. But when all three set out on a rescue mission for the little ones, it's Tom, Jerry and Spike who'll need rescuing.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Flea Bitten
programme.desc: When Tom finds Butch having a bath upstairs, he gives him the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around tub isn't the only thing the alley cat's left behind because now the house is infested with fleas. It's war as Tom, Jerry and Spike must do something to get rid of these pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Shadow Boxin'
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been strapped with Tom its entire life the talking shadow refuses to go back to the life he once had! When Tom's shadow becomes a total nuisance to both Tom and Jerry, they must team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Dandy Do Gooders
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Deal
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of young cat named Gumball Watterson. Gumball has a penchant for getting into trouble but he never seems to learn his lesson. Gumball's best friend is a fish named Darwin, who used to be the family pet until he grew legs and became part of the family. Gumball resents his younger sister, Anais, because she is the smartest member of the family. Gumball's mother is the breadwinner in the family, working long hours at the rainbow factory, and his father stays at home watching TV and playing video games.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Line
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of young cat named Gumball Watterson. Gumball has a penchant for getting into trouble but he never seems to learn his lesson. Gumball's best friend is a fish named Darwin, who used to be the family pet until he grew legs and became part of the family. Gumball resents his younger sister, Anais, because she is the smartest member of the family. Gumball's mother is the breadwinner in the family, working long hours at the rainbow factory, and his father stays at home watching TV and playing video games.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Third
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - there's Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues we've all been through. Gumball's hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird….

programme.title: Unikitty
Late Night Talky Time
programme.desc: In a joyous kingdom full of sparkle matter, happy thoughts and the occasional rage-out, join Unikitty and a whole cast of friends into a world full of adventure excitement and dance parties. As ruler of the kingdom Unikitty has busy days full of royal responsibilities. Unikitty is most interested in making sure everyone is happy and ridding the kingdom of negativity but don't misunderstand her optimism - she is one kitty not to be crossed. While she may be full of boundless energy and creativity Unikitty is a force to be reckoned with if anyone gets in the way of spreading her positive vibes, especially if anyone makes her little brother and best friend Puppycorn sad. Also living in the castle are Dr. Fox the resident scientist and Unikitty's trusty bodyguard Hawkodile. Through it all Unikitty and her friends make sure that every day is the happiest and most creative ever.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
Worship
programme.desc: In this reboot of the classic Cartoon Network series, the Powerpuff Girls return to protect Townsville from villains who want to take over the metropolis. Sisters Blossom, Bubbles and Buttercup have to manage their homework with their superhero activities as they face a continuous parade of bad guys. Although they have good teamwork, the sisters sometimes need to get help from Professor Utonium and The Mayor to help them take down the evildoers. The girls hope to show people that it's possible to save the world and still get to bed before their bedtime.

programme.title: Mr Magoo
The Golden Fizz
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
Hulking Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!

Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird….

programme.title: Bakugan
The Awesome Brawlers Vs. Haavik
programme.desc: When Bakugan begin emerging from the earth's crust in a mysterious worldwide "awakening," Dan and his friends find themselves at the epicentre of a new age. They quickly learn that they must grow into more than just suburban kids looking for quick fame in the post-Bakugan era. They must learn how to work with their Bakugan and deploy them in battle in order to survive the seemingly endless forces out to control, enslave or just plain destroy the mysterious race of alien creatures. Dan and his friends seek to become heroes as they protect their Bakugan, the Earth and ultimately an incredible secret hidden beneath their feet.

programme.title: Ninjago: Masters Of Spinjitzu
Saving Faith
programme.desc: NinjaGo: Masters of Spinjitzu centers on the adventures of five ninjas. The show is set in the fictional world of Ninjago a place inspired by Chinese and Japanese myths and culture. The land is divided between NinjaGo proper and the Dark Island where the Overlord resides. It has an underworld where beings of evil like Lord Garmadon and the Skullkins dwell together with sacred places where many things are hidden or forgotten (like the Serpentine tombs or the Golden Weapons). The main characters are in tune with certain elemental properties (the elements in this case being Fire Ice Lightning Earth and Creation.) While featuring several historically designed buildings and traditional clothing NinjaGo is a modern setting incorporating large metropolises with skyscrapers current-age (and futuristic) vehicles modern electronics and semi-robotic exo-suits among other temporal displacements.

programme.title: Power Players
Bowling For Ballers
programme.desc: Axel, a 9-year-old boy who can transform into a living action figure, gains a wild new perspective on the world as he wrangles a team of quirky smart-toys on the biggest small adventures a kid could ever imagine. Life as a toy superhero has its pluses and minuses. On the upside, Axel has massive mecha suit power, a cool energy sword, an impenetrable shield and other abilities he himself hasn't even discovered yet. Axel is much stronger, more skilled and faster than when he's his human self. On the downside, toy Axel is only seven-inches tall, and the world around him is no longer adapted to his size: the garden turns into a huge mysterious jungle, a sandbox becomes a desert...! The real world gets a whole lot more complicated and dangerous when Axel sees it from a toy point of view!

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Flower
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - there's Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues we've all been through. Gumball's hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird….

programme.title: Ben 10
Story, Board
programme.desc: While on a seemingly endless summer vacation with his Grandpa Max and Cousin Gwen, Ben Tennyson discovers an alien watch: the Omnitrix. This device gives Ben the ability to transform into any one of ten spectacular and powerful aliens! Ben, Gwen and Max travel the country in their motor home affectionately known as the Rust Bucket seeing the sights, stumbling into adventures and beating down would-be villains while generally having a blast!

programme.desc: The adventures of Robin, Cyborg, Starfire, Raven and Beast Boy. They are superheroes who save the day, but what happens when they're not fighting crime?

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
Rock'n'lemming
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Friend
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - there's Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues we've all been through. Gumball's hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird….

programme.title: Mr Magoo
The Golden Fizz
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes
The Bigfoot In Bed
programme.desc: Follow the hilarious, heroic and mischievous Bugs Bunny in a series of slapstick comedic shorts that find the carrot-loving rabbit matching his wits against classic characters such as Theodore "Tasmanian" Devil, Wile E. Coyote and Yosemite Sam. Along the way, Bugs encounters brand-new foes but he has some help from new friends like Bigfoot and Squeaks the Squirrel!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
No Fly Zone
programme.desc: After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen - only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese - including waking up Tom!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Charity Case
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Tom's precious blanket to Badwill, Jerry's determined to get it back. Unfortunately, with all the strange, bizarre, enchanted items that have been donated over the centuries, getting anything back from Badwill is not easily done.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Duck, Duck, Loose
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Tuffy's Big Adventure
programme.desc: When Tuffy and Tyke head out on their own big adventure into the snowy mountains during a family vacation, Tom catches the blame from Spike and Jerry for letting them go. But when all three set out on a rescue mission for the little ones, it's Tom, Jerry and Spike who'll need rescuing.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Flea Bitten
programme.desc: When Tom finds Butch having a bath upstairs, he gives him the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around tub isn't the only thing the alley cat's left behind because now the house is infested with fleas. It's war as Tom, Jerry and Spike must do something to get rid of these pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Shadow Boxin'
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been strapped with Tom its entire life the talking shadow refuses to go back to the life he once had! When Tom's shadow becomes a total nuisance to both Tom and Jerry, they must team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
Dandy Do Gooders
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Deal
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of young cat named Gumball Watterson. Gumball has a penchant for getting into trouble but he never seems to learn his lesson. Gumball's best friend is a fish named Darwin, who used to be the family pet until he grew legs and became part of the family. Gumball resents his younger sister, Anais, because she is the smartest member of the family. Gumball's mother is the breadwinner in the family, working long hours at the rainbow factory, and his father stays at home watching TV and playing video games.

programme.title: Unikitty
Late Night Talky Time
programme.desc: In a joyous kingdom full of sparkle matter, happy thoughts and the occasional rage-out, join Unikitty and a whole cast of friends into a world full of adventure excitement and dance parties. As ruler of the kingdom Unikitty has busy days full of royal responsibilities. Unikitty is most interested in making sure everyone is happy and ridding the kingdom of negativity but don't misunderstand her optimism - she is one kitty not to be crossed. While she may be full of boundless energy and creativity Unikitty is a force to be reckoned with if anyone gets in the way of spreading her positive vibes, especially if anyone makes her little brother and best friend Puppycorn sad. Also living in the castle are Dr. Fox the resident scientist and Unikitty's trusty bodyguard Hawkodile. Through it all Unikitty and her friends make sure that every day is the happiest and most creative ever.

programme.title: Unikitty

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
Worship
programme.desc: In this reboot of the classic Cartoon Network series, the Powerpuff Girls return to protect Townsville from villains who want to take over the metropolis. Sisters Blossom, Bubbles and Buttercup have to manage their homework with their superhero activities as they face a continuous parade of bad guys. Although they have good teamwork, the sisters sometimes need to get help from Professor Utonium and The Mayor to help them take down the evildoers. The girls hope to show people that it's possible to save the world and still get to bed before their bedtime.

programme.title: Mr Magoo
The Golden Fizz
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
Hulking Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Uploads
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of young cat named Gumball Watterson. Gumball has a penchant for getting into trouble but he never seems to learn his lesson. Gumball's best friend is a fish named Darwin, who used to be the family pet until he grew legs and became part of the family. Gumball resents his younger sister, Anais, because she is the smartest member of the family. Gumball's mother is the breadwinner in the family, working long hours at the rainbow factory, and his father stays at home watching TV and playing video games.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
The Goons
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - there's Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues we've all been through. Gumball's hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird….

programme.title: Bakugan
The Awesome Brawlers Vs. Haavik
programme.desc: When Bakugan begin emerging from the earth's crust in a mysterious worldwide "awakening," Dan and his friends find themselves at the epicentre of a new age. They quickly learn that they must grow into more than just suburban kids looking for quick fame in the post-Bakugan era. They must learn how to work with their Bakugan and deploy them in battle in order to survive the seemingly endless forces out to control, enslave or just plain destroy the mysterious race of alien creatures. Dan and his friends seek to become heroes as they protect their Bakugan, the Earth and ultimately an incredible secret hidden beneath their feet.
